Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.description: SQL related query operations on Commserver and external databases
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs><INP_DB_TABLE_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">TEST_WF_TABLE</INP_DB_TABLE_NAME><INP_COLUMN1 class="java.lang.String" class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">2016-27-27 03:27:27</INP_COL3_DATA><INP_COL4_DATA class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">0</INP_COL4_DATA><INP_COL5_DATA class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">test@commvault.com</INP_COL5_DATA><INP_COL6_DATA class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Commserver</INP_COL6_DATA><INP_COL7_DATA class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><INP_COL8_DATA class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">COMPLETED</INP_COL8_DATA><INP_COL9_DATA class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">YES</INP_COL9_DATA><INP_COUNTER class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">0</INP_DELAY><X class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false" /></inputs>
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: WF_DB_OPERATIONS
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables><val class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">0</val><VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_PAUSE_STRING class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">.</VAR_PAUSE_STRING><VAR_WF_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">COMPLETED</VAR_WF_STATUS><VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">.</VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE><var1 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><var2 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><var3 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><var4 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></variables>

children.displayName: Provide the number of entries to insert in the database
children.name: INP_COUNTER

children.displayName: String to be updated in column
children.name: INPUT_UPDATE_STRING

children.displayName: String to check in the column [ condition ]
children.name: INPUT_CHECK_STRING

children.displayName: Delete table contents before and after workflow execution?
children.documentation: Highly suggest to select true, because next test might fail, because of pre-existing table contents
children.name: INP_DELETE_TABLE_CONTENTS

children.displayName: Number of seconds to delay workflow between insrt and update operations
children.name: INP_DELAY

children.displayName: Pause workflow in insert data process block?
children.name: INP_INSERT_DATA_PAUSE

children.displayName: Pause workflow in update data process block?
children.name: INP_UPDATE_DATA_PAUSE

children.displayName: Pause workflow in create db database?
children.name: INP_CREATE_DB_PAUSE

onEnter.script: workflow.setVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE","PHASE START : [" + xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId} + "][" + xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName} + "][" + xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime} +"] : START WORKFLOW "); logger.info("INFO: VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE : [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE") + "]");

Activity.description: executes queries against a specified database
Activity.name: SQLQuery

inputs.val:
<inputs><databaseType class="workflow.types.DatabaseType" _list_="false">MSSQL</databaseType><server class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_SERVER}</server><databaseName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_SERVER_INSTANCE}</databaseName><userName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_USER}</userName><password class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_PASSWORD}</password><query class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT * FROM sys.objects  WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_tableName}]'
)
AND type in (N'U')) 
BEGIN 
CREATE TABLE [dbo].xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_tableName}(
xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_column1} nvarchar(MAX),
xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_column2} nvarchar(MAX),
xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_column3} nvarchar(MAX),
xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_column4} nvarchar(MAX),
xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_column5} nvarchar(MAX),
xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_column6} nvarchar(MAX),
xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_column7} nvarchar(MAX),
xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_column8} nvarchar(MAX),
xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_column9} nvarchar(MAX), )
END</query><properties class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes queries against a specified database
Activity.name: SQLQuery

inputs.val: <inputs><databaseType class="workflow.types.DatabaseType" _list_="false">MSSQL</databaseType><server class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_SERVER}</server><databaseName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_SERVER_INSTANCE}</databaseName><userName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_USER}</userName><password class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_PASSWORD}</password><query class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">DELETE FROM [dbo].xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_tableName}</query></inputs>

inputs.val:
<inputs><databaseType class="workflow.types.DatabaseType" _list_="false">MSSQL</databaseType><server class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_db_server}</server><databaseName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_db_server_instance}</databaseName><userName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_db_user}</userName><password class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_db_password}</password><query class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">INSERT INTO xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_tableName} (    
[xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col1}],
[xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col2}],
[xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col3}],
[xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col4}],
[xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col5}],
[xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col6}],
[xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col7}],
[xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col8}],
[xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col9}]) 
VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?);</query><properties class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><parameters><value>xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col_val1}</value><type>OBJECT</type></parameters><parameters><value>xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col_val2}</value><type>OBJECT</type></parameters><parameters><value>xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col_val3}</value><type>OBJECT</type></parameters><parameters><value>xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col_val4}</value><type>OBJECT</type></parameters><parameters><value>xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col_val5}</value><type>OBJECT</type></parameters><parameters><value>xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col_val6}</value><type>OBJECT</type></parameters><parameters><value>xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col_val7}</value><type>OBJECT</type></parameters><parameters><value>xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col_val8}</value><type>OBJECT</type></parameters><parameters><value>xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_2/pb_col_val9}</value><type>OBJECT</type></parameters></inputs>

workflow.setVariable("val", val);

" /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes queries against a specified database
Activity.name: SQLQuery

inputs.val:
<inputs><databaseType class="workflow.types.DatabaseType" _list_="false">MSSQL</databaseType><server class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_db_server}</server><databaseName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_db_server_instance}</databaseName><userName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_db_user}</userName><password class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_db_password}</password><query class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">UPDATE 
    [xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_tableName}] 
SET 
    xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_col_to_set}='xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_value_to_set}'
WHERE
    xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_col_to_check}='xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_col_check_val}'
AND
    xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_counter_col}='xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_counter}'</query></inputs>

Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="int val = workflow.getVariable("val") + 1;
workflow.setVariable("val", val);
return val;
" /></inputs>

condition.script: xpath:{/workflow/Script_3/output} < xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_COUNTER}

inputs.val: <inputs><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_STATUS}</INP_STATUS><INP_JOBID class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId}</INP_JOBID><INP_WORKFLOW_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName}</INP_WORKFLOW_NAME><INP_START_TIME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}</INP_START_TIME><INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE}</INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE></inputs>

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_7/pb_status} + "]");
logger.info("INFO: INP_COUNTER : [" + xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_COUNTER} + "]");
logger.info("INFO: NUMBER OF ROWS UPDATED : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_7/pb_number_of_rows} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_7/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED") || xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_COUNTER} != xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_7/pb_number_of_rows})
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", "Number of rows updates is not equal to the Input Counter.");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}" /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes queries against a specified database
Activity.name: SQLQuery

inputs.val: <inputs><databaseType class="workflow.types.DatabaseType" _list_="false">MSSQL</databaseType><server class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_SERVER}</server><databaseName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_SERVER_INSTANCE}</databaseName><userName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_USER}</userName><password class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_PASSWORD}</password><query class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">DELETE FROM xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_TABLE_NAME}</query></inputs>

Activity.name: SQLQuery

inputs.val: <inputs><databaseType class="workflow.types.DatabaseType" _list_="false">MSSQL</databaseType><server class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_SERVER}</server><databaseName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_SERVER_INSTANCE}</databaseName><userName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_USER}</userName><password class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_PASSWORD}</password><query class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">SELECT * FROM xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DB_TABLE_NAME} WHERE xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INPUT_UPDATE_COLUMN}='xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INPUT_UPDATE_STRING}'</query></inputs>
